mapper.select: /* 파일정보 상세 조회 */ SELECT FILE_NO AS fileNo , BOARD_NO AS boardNo , ORG_FILE_NAME AS orgFileName , FILE_PATH AS filePath , FILE_SIZE AS fileSize , CREATE_DATE AS createDate , UPDATE_DATE AS updateDate FROM FILE_INFO WHERE 1=1 AND FILE_NO = #{fileNo} AND BOARD_NO =#{boardNo} ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC
